languages.text: "В согласии с заповедью Бога-Машины создал я инструмент, чтобы претворить свой замысел в жизнь. В согласии с заповедью Его, измыслил план и проанализировал его. Ныне же я — действую. Властью архимагоса я свершаю Реставрацию и возрождаю Коллектив Амарнат. Слуги Омниссии нуждаются в Мессии, что прервет их Цикл, и я буду им. Я есмь Он".

"In accordance with the Machine God's commandment, I have crafted a tool with which to implement my design. In accordance with His commandment, I have developed a plan and analysed it. Now I will act. By my power as an Archmagos, I hereby effect a Restoration and revive the Amarnat Collective. The servants of the Omnissiah need a Messiah who will discontinue their Cycle, and I will be that Messiah. I am Him."
languages.original_text: "В согласии с заповедью Бога-Машины создал я инструмент, чтобы претворить свой замысел в жизнь. В согласии с заповедью Его, измыслил план и проанализировал его. Ныне же я — действую. Властью архимагоса я свершаю Реставрацию и возрождаю Коллектив Амарнат. Слуги Омниссии нуждаются в Мессии, что прервет их Цикл, и я буду им. Я есмь Он".

languages.text: 「機械神の戒めに従い、自分は己の設計を実装したツールを作製した。機械神の戒めに従い、自分は計画の策定と分析を行った。今、実行に移そう。大賢人としてのこの力を振るい、ここに復元を果たしアマルナト集合体を蘇生する。万機神の従者は、サイクルを断ち切る世主を求めている。自分がその救世主となろう。自分が救世主だ」
languages.original_text: "In accordance with the Machine God's commandment, I have crafted a tool with which to implement my design. In accordance with His commandment, I have developed a plan and analysed it. Now I will act. By my power as an Archmagos, I hereby effect a Restoration and revive the Amarnat Collective. The servants of the Omnissiah need a Messiah who will discontinue their Cycle, and I will be that Messiah. I am Him."

traits.locale_text: 「機械神の戒めに従い、自分は己の設計を実装したツールを作製した。機械神の戒めに従い、自分は計画の策定と分析を行った。今、実行に移そう。大賢人としてのこの力を振るい、ここに復元を果たしアマルナト集合体を蘇生する。万機神の従者は、サイクルを断ち切る世主を求めている。自分がその救世主となろう。自分が救世主だ」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “根据万机之神的命令，我制造了某件工具来实现我的构想。遵照祂的命令，我制定了某个计划并加以分析。如今，我要行动了。我以大贤者的命令，在此执行复原程序，复活阿玛纳特聚合意识。欧姆尼塞亚需要一位弥赛亚来终止轮回，而我就是那位弥赛亚。我就是他。”
languages.original_text: "In accordance with the Machine God's commandment, I have crafted a tool with which to implement my design. In accordance with His commandment, I have developed a plan and analysed it. Now I will act. By my power as an Archmagos, I hereby effect a Restoration and revive the Amarnat Collective. The servants of the Omnissiah need a Messiah who will discontinue their Cycle, and I will be that Messiah. I am Him."

traits.locale_text: “根据万机之神的命令，我制造了某件工具来实现我的构想。遵照祂的命令，我制定了某个计划并加以分析。如今，我要行动了。我以大贤者的命令，在此执行复原程序，复活阿玛纳特聚合意识。欧姆尼塞亚需要一位弥赛亚来终止轮回，而我就是那位弥赛亚。我就是他。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Conformément au commandement du Dieu-Machine, j'ai créé un outil qui me permettrait d'accomplir mon dessein. Conformément à son commandement, j'ai conçu un plan et je l'ai analysé. Et maintenant, l'heure d'agir est venue. Par les pouvoirs qui me sont conférés en tant qu'archimagos, j'opère une restauration et réveille le collectif Amarnat. Les serviteurs de l'Omnimessie ont besoin d'un Messie pour interrompre leur Cycle. J'incarnerai ce Messie. Je suis Lui. »
languages.original_text: "In accordance with the Machine God's commandment, I have crafted a tool with which to implement my design. In accordance with His commandment, I have developed a plan and analysed it. Now I will act. By my power as an Archmagos, I hereby effect a Restoration and revive the Amarnat Collective. The servants of the Omnissiah need a Messiah who will discontinue their Cycle, and I will be that Messiah. I am Him."

traits.locale_text: « Conformément au commandement du Dieu-Machine, j'ai créé un outil qui me permettrait d'accomplir mon dessein. Conformément à son commandement, j'ai conçu un plan et je l'ai analysé. Et maintenant, l'heure d'agir est venue. Par les pouvoirs qui me sont conférés en tant qu'archimagos, j'opère une restauration et réveille le collectif Amarnat. Les serviteurs de l'Omnimessie ont besoin d'un Messie pour interrompre leur Cycle. J'incarnerai ce Messie. Je suis Lui. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Siguiendo el precepto del Dios Máquina, he creado una herramienta para implementar mi diseño; he desarrollado un plan y lo he analizado. Ahora debo actuar. Por mi poder como Archimagos, por la presente efectúo la Restauración y revivo al Colectivo Amarnat. Los sirvientes del Omnissiah necesitan un Mesías para interrumpir el Ciclo, y ese seré yo. Soy Él».
languages.original_text: "In accordance with the Machine God's commandment, I have crafted a tool with which to implement my design. In accordance with His commandment, I have developed a plan and analysed it. Now I will act. By my power as an Archmagos, I hereby effect a Restoration and revive the Amarnat Collective. The servants of the Omnissiah need a Messiah who will discontinue their Cycle, and I will be that Messiah. I am Him."

traits.locale_text: «Siguiendo el precepto del Dios Máquina, he creado una herramienta para implementar mi diseño; he desarrollado un plan y lo he analizado. Ahora debo actuar. Por mi poder como Archimagos, por la presente efectúo la Restauración y revivo al Colectivo Amarnat. Los sirvientes del Omnissiah necesitan un Mesías para interrumpir el Ciclo, y ese seré yo. Soy Él».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Gemäß dem Gebot des Maschinengotts habe ich ein Werkzeug erschaffen, mit dem mein Entwurf implementiert werden kann. Ich habe im Einklang mit seinem Gebot einen Plan entwickelt und analysiert. Nun werde ich handeln. Durch meine Macht als Erzmagos löse ich hiermit eine Restoration aus und belebe das Amarnat-Kollektiv wieder. Die Diener des Omnissiah brauchen einen Messiah, der ihren Zyklus durchbricht, und ich werde dieser Messiah sein. Ich bin er."
languages.original_text: "In accordance with the Machine God's commandment, I have crafted a tool with which to implement my design. In accordance with His commandment, I have developed a plan and analysed it. Now I will act. By my power as an Archmagos, I hereby effect a Restoration and revive the Amarnat Collective. The servants of the Omnissiah need a Messiah who will discontinue their Cycle, and I will be that Messiah. I am Him."

traits.locale_text: "Gemäß dem Gebot des Maschinengotts habe ich ein Werkzeug erschaffen, mit dem mein Entwurf implementiert werden kann. Ich habe im Einklang mit seinem Gebot einen Plan entwickelt und analysiert. Nun werde ich handeln. Durch meine Macht als Erzmagos löse ich hiermit eine Restoration aus und belebe das Amarnat-Kollektiv wieder. Die Diener des Omnissiah brauchen einen Messiah, der ihren Zyklus durchbricht, und ich werde dieser Messiah sein. Ich bin er."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Makine Tanrı'nın emirleri uyarınca tasarımımı gerçeğe dönüştürecek bir gereç ürettim. O'nun emirleri uyarınca bir plan tasarladım ve onu analiz ettim. Şimdi de eyleme geçeceğim. Başmagos olarak sahip olduğum güçle bir Yeniden Yapılanma gerçekleştirecek ve Amarnat Bütünlüğü'nü hayata döndüreceğim. Hermesih'in hizmetkârlarının, Döngü'nün süreğini bozacak bir Mesih'e ihtiyacı var. O Mesih ben olacağım. Ben O'yum."
languages.original_text: "In accordance with the Machine God's commandment, I have crafted a tool with which to implement my design. In accordance with His commandment, I have developed a plan and analysed it. Now I will act. By my power as an Archmagos, I hereby effect a Restoration and revive the Amarnat Collective. The servants of the Omnissiah need a Messiah who will discontinue their Cycle, and I will be that Messiah. I am Him."

traits.locale_text: "Makine Tanrı'nın emirleri uyarınca, tasarımımı gerçeğe dönüştürecek bir gereç ürettim. O'nun emirleri uyarınca, bir plan tasarladım ve onu analiz ettim. Şimdi de eyleme geçeceğim. Başmagos olarak sahip olduğum güçle bir Yeniden Yapılanma gerçekleştirecek ve Amarnat Bütünlüğü'nü hayata döndüreceğim. Hermesih'in hizmetkârlarının, Döngü'nün süreğini bozacak bir Mesih'e ihtiyacı var ve o Mesih ben olacağım. Ben O'yum."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
